https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/w8VhMrB5ReMpvMIFBK5h8lLZUpa.jpg Spotlight on a new form of literature : Threads. After the novel-to-film adaptation, BLEAK: WHO is the first Prime Video fiction adapted from a Twitter thread. Recently, Twitter's users became even more creative and pushed the limits of literature through these short, often interactive stories, told in the form of several linked tweets. Bleak : Who
